title: Vespers in the Snow
description: Professor Philip Osborne is Clive Aldridgeâ€™s toughest teacher, but he has a secret: Osbourne is sneaking out to celebrate Hanukkah at the risk of offending his peers. Bolstered by the knowledge that his teacher is actually human, Clive makes an effort to form a friendship that will over the decades grow into much more.
author: M. Jules Aedin
